atcoderExtension.c.checker.markdownDescription: command line checker for C, you can use $taskfile, $execfile, $taskpath, $projectpath, $tmppath, $site, $contest, $task, $extension.

atcoderExtension.c.compiler.markdownDescription: command line compiler for C, see `#atcoderExtension.c.checker#`

atcoderExtension.c.executor.markdownDescription: command line executor for C, see `#atcoderExtension.c.checker#`

atcoderExtension.c++.checker.markdownDescription: command line checker for C++, see `#atcoderExtension.c.checker#`

atcoderExtension.c++.compiler.markdownDescription: command line compiler for C++, see `#atcoderExtension.c.checker#`

atcoderExtension.c++.executor.markdownDescription: command line executor for C++, see `#atcoderExtension.c.checker#`

atcoderExtension.go.executor.markdownDescription: command line executor for Go, see `#atcoderExtension.c.checker#`

atcoderExtension.python.checker.markdownDescription: command line checker for Python, see `#atcoderExtension.c.checker#`

atcoderExtension.javascript.checker.markdownDescription: command line checker for JavaScript, see `#atcoderExtension.c.checker#`

atcoderExtension.user1.extension.markdownDescription: extension for user1, create a template file with this extension in the template folder.

atcoderExtension.user1.checker.markdownDescription: command line checker for user1, see `#atcoderExtension.c.checker#`

atcoderExtension.user1.compiler.markdownDescription: command line compiler for user1, see `#atcoderExtension.c.checker#`

atcoderExtension.user1.executor.markdownDescription: command line executor for user1, see `#atcoderExtension.c.checker#`

scripts.release: npm run release-premerge && npx standard-version && vsce publish && npm run release-postmerge
scripts.release-premerge: git switch main && git merge --no-ff develop --no-edit
scripts.release-postmerge: git push --follow-tags origin main && git push origin develop && git switch develop
